$$ \begin{eqnarray} \frac{\partial{T}}{\partial{t}} + V \cdot \nabla{T} &=& \kappa \nabla ^2 T \\ \rho \frac{DV}{Dt} &=& - \nabla p + \eta \nabla^2 + \rho g \\ \nabla \cdot {V} &=& 0 \\ \end{eqnarray} $$
For inline equations, use \\( and \\). So \\(x=\phi\\) will render as \(x=\phi\).
